Reviews.Title: “clean, comfortable, friendly, great position”
Reviews.Author: cycleaddict
Reviews.Content: stayed 3 nights weekend deal impressed floor arrival obliged id read couple comments cold extra blanket night cold outside delivered immediately didnt temperature perfect bathroom spotless bed hard thats mattress slept positive location 10 min walk tram opposite alexanderplatz 5 mins hofbrauhaus munich fancy bit music 10 mins uphill opposite direction left theres lovely cafe bars restaurants found wonderful restaurant ate twice portions choice food tasty value id happily recommend ibis mitte youre planning berlin walk main historical sights

Reviews.Title: “A good budget choice, well located and helpful staff”

Reviews.Content: stayed 3 nights recently lads berlin stag weekend 2 stag parties behaved arrived friday afternoon 4pm checkin quick painless stag party arrived 2 hours missed crowds fairly typical ibis nice clean flat screen tv selection channels ones didnt switch usual compact bathroom suite shower wifi paid free wifi reception bar 2 pcs free location hill transport links tram stop outside short walk hospitality didnt try breakfast time served 11am weekends bar drinks throughout day reasonably priced overall id stay perfectly adequate hotel ibis wont disappointed
